entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 2:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: SSW 36 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries or rain showers beginning late this evening then changing to periods of rain after midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the morning. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning then southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
